alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Aitkin, northwestern Pine, southwestern St. Louis, Carlton and west central Douglas Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1144 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Aitkin, to 10 miles north of Malmo, to near Isle, moving northeast at 70 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... McGregor, McGrath and Mille Lacs Band East Lake Area around 1155 PM CDT. Palisade around 1200 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Big Sandy Lake, Tamarack, Libby, Willow River, Cromwell, Rutledge and Moose Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Aitkin
